title: Printable Lease Agreement Options
description: Having a lease agreement template will save you a lot of time. Take a look at these lease agreement printable options to make your life easier.
author: Samantha Lile
excerpt: Having a lease agreement template will save you a lot of time. Take a look at these lease agreement printable options to make your life easier.
text: Planning to rent some property? Mastering all the legalities of leasing rental property can be overwhelming. How do you account for all potential scenarios and risks? A lease agreement is a binding contract between a landlord and a tenant that defines all the terms of a rental, and any property owner can purchase an inexpensive lease agreement printable to simplify the leasing process.The Benefits of a Printable Lease AgreementRegardless of whether the leased property is a house, office, room, or car, utilizing a printable lease agreement offers numerous advantages. Lease agreement templates are not only very affordable, typically priced at $3 or less, but they also provide a convenient option for busy small business owners, property managers, or real estate agents.Because most of the printable lease agreement template options are editable, it’s easy to customize the same rental contract for multiple tenants. Likewise, a printable lease agreement can be a legally binding contract once you get the lease signed, so it protects the interests of both the tenant and the landlord.Residential Lease Agreement vs. a Commercial Lease AgreementIs there a difference between a residential lease agreement and a commercial lease agreement? Most obviously, a residential lease agreement is made to contract the rental of a home, while commercial agreements dictate the terms of renting an office, store, warehouse, or other commercial property.A residential lease agreement typically defines the tenant’s rights for daily living, while a commercial lease agreement will be more complex and focus on tenant restrictions and terms under which the property can be used. Residential leases also often provide the tenant with legal protections that don’t apply to commercial rental contracts. Both typically define who is responsible for various maintenance and repairs, as well as lease terms like security deposits and commitment periods.Lease Agreements You Can Print and Use TodayAre you a small business owner with a rental property, and you need to simplify the leasing process? You can choose from a plethora of lease agreement template options offered by a variety of websites, including Etsy. In fact, printable lease agreements are available for practically any type of rental scenario, from rooms and homes to office space and even automobiles.Simple Lease AgreementThis straightforward, one-page lease agreement template is ideal for residential rentals. The editable digital download outlines essential terms, including the property description and lease term. It includes both a one-page version and a two-page template, along with a guide to the lease contract, all of which can be completed in just 5 minutes.Standard Lease AgreementWhile a simple lease agreement might suffice for more basic rental arrangements, other contracts require standard lease agreements. Standard agreements, such as this example of a standard residential lease template, include information such as the names and contact details of the lessee and lessor, the property address, terms of the lease, rental rates, and security deposit details.Short-Term Rental Lease AgreementCertain lease agreements, particularly those for vacation rentals, are designed for a brief, predetermined duration. You can locate a rental lease agreement template online, such as this one, which you can customize for your vacation rental agreement or any other short-term lease.Editable Lease AgreementAn editable lease contract, such as this one, can be easily downloaded and tailored for any residential property, landlord, and tenant. The lease agreement is pre-prepared, allowing small business owners to simply input their personal information and obtain the necessary signatures.Easy Lease AgreementAre you searching for a simple lease agreement that you can edit in Microsoft Word? This editable vacation rental agreement provides a legal framework for outlining the terms of a short-term lease. The 6-page landlord contract is user-friendly and easy to format.Residential Lease AgreementThere is a wide selection of printable residential lease agreements that you can download from Etsy and various other online platforms. This residential rental agreement is an editable Word template that spans four pages and contains all the typical sections found in a lease agreement.Sublease AgreementPrintable lease agreement templates are also available for those subletting a property or renting a room. Sublease rental agreements like this one can help to establish house rules and expectations for co-living with housemates on a short- or long-term basis.Printable Eviction NoticeAn unfortunate aspect of a small business leasing property is evicting tenants. Printable eviction notice templates like this one can help alleviate the hassle of removing occupants from a property. The single digital download can be used for unlimited prints and emails.Office Lease AgreementA commercial lease agreement helps determine if a tenant violates the terms or makes another lease violation. Printable lease agreement templates like this one help out small business owners who are renting out office space or other commercial buildings.Lease Agreement TemplatesResidential lease agreements help protect a landlord’s interests and help prevent misunderstandings that could lead to litigation. Printable lease agreement templates like these digital downloads make the leasing process easier for busy small business owners.Editable Car Lease Agreement TemplateResidential and commercial properties are not the only options available for leasing. Printable templates for a vehicle rental agreement are also accessible. This editable car rental contract outlines the terms for temporarily renting a vehicle for a fee.READ MORE: Leasing a Car for Business? 5 Reasons to Pick the One You Really WantPDF Month-to-Month or Periodic Lease AgreementThis month-to-month lease agreement is available in a bilingual format, displaying English and Spanish side by side. It is a detailed 11-page PDF that includes a standard residential lease agreement, designed for month-to-month or periodic rental terms.Commercial Lease AgreementLooking for a commercial leasing contract between a landlord and a tenant? Consider this simple commercial lease agreement template to help simplify the leasing process. The one-page document is available in both PDF and Word file formats.Printable House LeaseA residential lease agreement must contain essential information such as contact details, rights and responsibilities, and the monthly rent amount. This printable lease agreement template assists real estate professionals and property managers in transitioning from the rental application process to the collection of tenant rents.FAQsWhat is the difference between a lease and a rental agreement?While there are many similarities between a lease agreement and a rental contract, the primary difference lies in the length of the legally binding document. A lease agreement typically covers a long-term contract that covers a fixed period of time, such as a year. Meanwhile, a rental agreement usually pertains to a short-term contract, such as 30 days or a month-to-month house rental agreement.Can Etsy sellers customize forms and templates?Some Etsy sellers who offer printable documents can customize their forms and templates. Certain Etsy sellers will personalize their handmade products like forms to suit specific business needs. Customers can request to add their logos, business information and more. Likewise, many printable lease agreements are editable, and similar details can be added using a computer.What is typically included in a rental lease agreement?While the details of any rental lease agreement can vary, some information is common to practically any of these important legal contracts. Most lease agreements will include details like the lease period, the monthly rent payment, and when to pay rent, as well as identifying information about the property owners, tenants, and actual location. Depending on the type of rental unit, the leasing contract also might have tenant and landlord responsibilities, as well as the option to automatically renew and other required data based on the governing law.Do lease agreements vary by state?If you plan to start a real estate small business where you rent a property, you want to understand leasing requirements in your state before your prospective tenant starts paying rent. There are variable lease agreements by state, and it’s important to know your local requirements before printing your own lease agreement. Some states more vigorously protect rental property tenants, while others might have specific requirements for a tenant’s security deposit and returned checks.Image: Envato ElementsMore in: Small Business Essentials
html:
Planning to rent some property? Mastering all the legalities of leasing rental property can be overwhelming. How do you account for all potential scenarios and risks? A lease agreement is a binding contract between a landlord and a tenant that defines all the terms of a rental, and any property owner can purchase an inexpensive lease agreement printable to simplify the leasing process.

The Benefits of a Printable Lease Agreement

Regardless of whether the leased property is a house, office, room, or car, utilizing a printable lease agreement offers numerous advantages. Lease agreement templates are not only very affordable, typically priced at $3 or less, but they also provide a convenient option for busy small business owners, property managers, or real estate agents.

Because most of the printable lease agreement template options are editable, it’s easy to customize the same rental contract for multiple tenants. Likewise, a printable lease agreement can be a legally binding contract once you get the lease signed, so it protects the interests of both the tenant and the landlord.

Residential Lease Agreement vs. a Commercial Lease Agreement

Is there a difference between a residential lease agreement and a commercial lease agreement? Most obviously, a residential lease agreement is made to contract the rental of a home, while commercial agreements dictate the terms of renting an office, store, warehouse, or other commercial property.

A residential lease agreement typically defines the tenant’s rights for daily living, while a commercial lease agreement will be more complex and focus on tenant restrictions and terms under which the property can be used. Residential leases also often provide the tenant with legal protections that don’t apply to commercial rental contracts. Both typically define who is responsible for various maintenance and repairs, as well as lease terms like security deposits and commitment periods.

Lease Agreements You Can Print and Use Today

Are you a small business owner with a rental property, and you need to simplify the leasing process? You can choose from a plethora of lease agreement template options offered by a variety of websites, including Etsy. In fact, printable lease agreements are available for practically any type of rental scenario, from rooms and homes to office space and even automobiles.

Simple Lease Agreement

This straightforward, one-page lease agreement template is ideal for residential rentals. The editable digital download outlines essential terms, including the property description and lease term. It includes both a one-page version and a two-page template, along with a guide to the lease contract, all of which can be completed in just 5 minutes.

Standard Lease Agreement

While a simple lease agreement might suffice for more basic rental arrangements, other contracts require standard lease agreements. Standard agreements, such as this example of a standard residential lease template, include information such as the names and contact details of the lessee and lessor, the property address, terms of the lease, rental rates, and security deposit details.

Short-Term Rental Lease Agreement

Certain lease agreements, particularly those for vacation rentals, are designed for a brief, predetermined duration. You can locate a rental lease agreement template online, such as this one, which you can customize for your vacation rental agreement or any other short-term lease.

Editable Lease Agreement

An editable lease contract, such as this one, can be easily downloaded and tailored for any residential property, landlord, and tenant. The lease agreement is pre-prepared, allowing small business owners to simply input their personal information and obtain the necessary signatures.

Easy Lease Agreement

Are you searching for a simple lease agreement that you can edit in Microsoft Word? This editable vacation rental agreement provides a legal framework for outlining the terms of a short-term lease. The 6-page landlord contract is user-friendly and easy to format.

Residential Lease Agreement

There is a wide selection of printable residential lease agreements that you can download from Etsy and various other online platforms. This residential rental agreement is an editable Word template that spans four pages and contains all the typical sections found in a lease agreement.

Sublease Agreement

Printable lease agreement templates are also available for those subletting a property or renting a room. Sublease rental agreements like this one can help to establish house rules and expectations for co-living with housemates on a short- or long-term basis.

Printable Eviction Notice

An unfortunate aspect of a small business leasing property is evicting tenants. Printable eviction notice templates like this one can help alleviate the hassle of removing occupants from a property. The single digital download can be used for unlimited prints and emails.

Office Lease Agreement

A commercial lease agreement helps determine if a tenant violates the terms or makes another lease violation. Printable lease agreement templates like this one help out small business owners who are renting out office space or other commercial buildings.

Lease Agreement Templates

Residential lease agreements help protect a landlord’s interests and help prevent misunderstandings that could lead to litigation. Printable lease agreement templates like these digital downloads make the leasing process easier for busy small business owners.

Editable Car Lease Agreement Template

Residential and commercial properties are not the only options available for leasing. Printable templates for a vehicle rental agreement are also accessible. This editable car rental contract outlines the terms for temporarily renting a vehicle for a fee.

  • READ MORE: Leasing a Car for Business? 5 Reasons to Pick the One You Really Want

PDF Month-to-Month or Periodic Lease Agreement

This month-to-month lease agreement is available in a bilingual format, displaying English and Spanish side by side. It is a detailed 11-page PDF that includes a standard residential lease agreement, designed for month-to-month or periodic rental terms.

Commercial Lease Agreement

Looking for a commercial leasing contract between a landlord and a tenant? Consider this simple commercial lease agreement template to help simplify the leasing process. The one-page document is available in both PDF and Word file formats.

Printable House Lease

A residential lease agreement must contain essential information such as contact details, rights and responsibilities, and the monthly rent amount. This printable lease agreement template assists real estate professionals and property managers in transitioning from the rental application process to the collection of tenant rents.

FAQs

What is the difference between a lease and a rental agreement?

While there are many similarities between a lease agreement and a rental contract, the primary difference lies in the length of the legally binding document. A lease agreement typically covers a long-term contract that covers a fixed period of time, such as a year. Meanwhile, a rental agreement usually pertains to a short-term contract, such as 30 days or a month-to-month house rental agreement.

Can Etsy sellers customize forms and templates?

Some Etsy sellers who offer printable documents can customize their forms and templates. Certain Etsy sellers will personalize their handmade products like forms to suit specific business needs. Customers can request to add their logos, business information and more. Likewise, many printable lease agreements are editable, and similar details can be added using a computer.

What is typically included in a rental lease agreement?

While the details of any rental lease agreement can vary, some information is common to practically any of these important legal contracts. Most lease agreements will include details like the lease period, the monthly rent payment, and when to pay rent, as well as identifying information about the property owners, tenants, and actual location. Depending on the type of rental unit, the leasing contract also might have tenant and landlord responsibilities, as well as the option to automatically renew and other required data based on the governing law.

Do lease agreements vary by state?

If you plan to start a real estate small business where you rent a property, you want to understand leasing requirements in your state before your prospective tenant starts paying rent. There are variable lease agreements by state, and it’s important to know your local requirements before printing your own lease agreement. Some states more vigorously protect rental property tenants, while others might have specific requirements for a tenant’s security deposit and returned checks.

Image: Envato Elements
